com.TennisApp.java.persistance

Class League_AssignmentDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.TennisApp.java.persistance.League_AssignmentDao

  • public class League_AssignmentDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the database access object class for the League_Assignment entity. It will perform various CRUD operations, to Create, Read one or many, Update, and Delete Leagues in the TennisApp. Additionally, it will allow for directional assignments. AssignLeagueToPlayer, when coming from the Player Maintenance direction, have playerId, need a league. or AssignPlayerToLeague, when coming from the League Maintenance direction, have leagueId, need a player. Created by Dave on 12/10/2015.
